# include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int counts(string s,string awe)
{
	int n = 0;
	size_t pos = 0;
	while ( (pos = s.find(awe,pos)) != std::string::npos) {
		n++;
		pos += 1;
	}
	return n;
}

inline string to_string ( int Number )
  {
     ostringstream ss;
     ss.clear();
     ss << Number;
     return ss.str();
  }

int main()
{
	
	
	int n,q;
	int k;
	cin>>q;
	string s;
	while(q--)
	{
		s = "";
		scanf("%d %d",&n,&k);
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			s.append(to_string(i));
		}
		printf("%d\n",counts(s,to_string(k)));//<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
